extendedInfo.description: FlightStats Traveler provides quick access to flight, airport and airline status for business and leisure travelers. This application has global coverage and is the most feature-rich free Android travel app on the market with features that include:Flight TrackingÂ· Check flight status by flight number, route or airportÂ· Flight on-a-map trackerÂ· Save a flight for 1-button status updatesSave Trip DetailsÂ· Create and save complete itinerary (flights, hotels, cars)Â· Share itineraries with friends, family and co-workersGlobal Airport InformationÂ· View airport arrivals and departuresÂ· Airport address, lat/long, current time and time zoneÂ· Worldwide airport delay information and delay mapsÂ· Local weather conditionsÂ· Save your favorite airports for fast reference Airline InformationÂ· Web and mobile website linksÂ· Reservation phone numbers Â· Save your favorite airlines for fast reference

reviews.title: Best free app. Galaxy tab 10.1 and RazrMaxx
reviews.comment: Extremely useful and easy to use.  Comprehensive updates about flight and airport status. I would pay and give five stars if it would synch across my talet and phone. Best free app for travelers.
reviews.author: P. TJ McGill

reviews.title: Not what it used to be
reviews.comment: Has this app not long ago.  No add banners and no cumbersome login to direct you to their website.  Tried for 45 minutes to send a request to ask how ad banners get removed and I gave up.  This was my favorite flight app but, well, there are others out there now.  If for some reason this get read I would like to get back to this app if someone would respond with instructions on removing adds.
reviews.author: I Ryde

reviews.title: Best trip itinerary app I could find
reviews.comment: Best app for keeping trip itinerary without having to book with the app. You can keep flight, transport and accommodation details all in the one place.  Only negative I could find was it didn\'t sync across multiple devices but still give it top rating.
reviews.author: Malcolm Ross

reviews.title: Useless.
reviews.comment: Refuses to recognise flight information utterly useless. I have to give it a minimum 1 star, doesn\'t deserve even that.
reviews.author: Barry Hearn

reviews.title: Only app that displayed my flights.
reviews.comment: I haven\'t use this app for a long time yet, but this is the only app so far that was able to display my flights, and I tried several before installing this one. The other apps would simply show flights from a year ago, and tell me to call the airline because there\'s no information.
reviews.author: Henri Leung

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Only one thing prevents me to give it five stars. It\'s not moveable to memory card.
reviews.author: Patel Dharmik

reviews.title: Great app but add Google+ login
reviews.comment: I have used this app for a very long time and love it.  The ads are annoying now but I would purchase if I could have them removed.  Adding the new Google+ login support would allow me to avoid adding flights both to my Android tablet and cell separately.
reviews.author: Robert Hattan

reviews.title: Forget tripit
reviews.comment: Why have an app that charge you for updated info and don\'t let you set yourself as viewer of friends/relatives fligths simply when you can have it all for free with Traveler by Flightstats? I was very glad to see on their website that they had developed this app. SUPER good!
reviews.author: Marcelo Gomes

reviews.title: Neglected stepchild to the much better iPhone app
reviews.comment: Flightstats continues to let our Android version lag months and months behind the much nicer Apple version. Time for a completely different app instead? Only Flightstats can decide that through paying attention to the faster-growing Google Play marketplace....
reviews.author: Erik Kruse

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t recognize my flights. Punch in your flight # and it spits out the wrong flight. Useless. Good thing its free. Uninstalling regardless. Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: Lucy Fer

reviews.comment: Very helpful app with all relevant details.
reviews.author: Smit Badai

reviews.title: Useless on galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: I cant go back in time more tgan a few days. Wanted ti check how delayed a flight was in july but it wont have it. Others seems to be ok so must be the galaxy note 2 thats the problem
reviews.author: Michael Bainbridge

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Often more reliable than airport announcements and easy to use. But please, it would be so much better if it would sync across multiple devices.
reviews.author: Anne Taylor

reviews.title: Tasking at intervals
reviews.comment: Will shut off but pops back on throughout the day. Unecessary data usage
reviews.author: Roger King

reviews.title: A time consuming waste
reviews.comment: According to this app, no flights ever leave Heathrow or Gatwick for Nice or Milas (Bodrum). Obviously not true, so the app is useless.
reviews.author: My Fred

reviews.title: Always unavailable
reviews.comment: Have to uninstall coz i cant use it. Everytime i search it says unavailable
reviews.author: Monkey Bum

reviews.title: Limited and basic app
reviews.comment: Lacks the useful tools available on the website.  IMHO, this stripped down app is useless.  I\'m better off logging into the website to get the info I need. On the other hand their website is great, I just wish they would incorporate those features into their app.
reviews.author: Sean G.

reviews.comment: Hard to select Airline, needs to accept correct code, e.g. VA
reviews.author: Antony Krokowski

reviews.title: Grid to have when travelling.
reviews.comment: Great app!
reviews.author: Anthony Corsen

reviews.title: Accurate one about the data
reviews.comment: My Parents flight was delayed and aborted at take off. All the other sites and google was showing it as on time and departed. Only this app was showing that there is a delay and the time of take off was also exactly mentioned. I can rely on this data.
reviews.author: srinivas reddy
